4:25 I’ve noticed many times you use the worq « farq » instead of « mukhtalif » , it’s not correct Urdu. 
Mukhtalif means different and Farq means difference. 
So when you say yeh do cheezen farq hain you’re basically saying « this 2 things are difference »
